headline: Rolling With The Punches: Shifting Attack Tactics & Dropping Packets Faster & Cheaper At The Edge
description: Over the past 6 months, volumetric DDoS attacks decreased by 82%. However volumetric attacks are not gone yet, still peaking as high as 418 Gbps. In this post, we cover the changing attack landscape and how Cloudflare adapts and evolves to keep the internet safe.
